## disposablePromise() function

Creates a Promise from an executor that returns a [Dispose](./race-cancellation.dispose.md) function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function disposablePromise<TResult>(executor: DisposableExecutor<TResult>, raceCancel?: RaceCancel): Promise<TResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  executor | [DisposableExecutor](./race-cancellation.disposableexecutor.md)<!-- -->&lt;TResult&gt; | a [DisposableExecutor](./race-cancellation.disposableexecutor.md) function. |
|  raceCancel | [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) | a [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) function to race against. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TResult&gt;
